skill.name: agent.skills.GetTransported
skill.description: For the agent, to move toward the given position and notify that it is ready to get transported. This skill is persistent until the unit has been transported by a carrier (via the "Transport" mission). The skill is considered as 'done' once the unit has been unloaded from carrier (even if the transportation is not complete, if the carrier get destroyed for instance).

parameter.name: position
parameter.description: The position (meeting point) to reach to get transported.

link.name: moveToward
link.description: To enact the decision to reach the given position.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when the agent has been unloaded from carrier.
